Articles.Content:
[JEBADIAH]

Mun base, spaceborne setting

And the base don't know that the base is getting

The creme de la creme of the space-side world in a

Show with everything but Ol' Bill

Time flies -- doesn't seem a minute

Since the Complex spa had the engi boys in it

All change -- don't you know that when you

Fly at this level there's no ordinary venue

It's Duna -- or Eeloo -- or Laythe -- or -- or this place!

[WHITESUITS]

One night on Alpha and the world's your oyster

The ships are temples and the fuel is free

You'll find a launch in every golden cloister

And if you're lucky then the launch is green

I can feel the launcher pushing up on me

[JEBADIAH]

One world's very like another

When your head's down over your joystick, brother

[WHITESUITS]

It's a drag, it's a bore, it's really such a pity

To be looking at the boards, not looking at the cities

[JEBADIAH]

Whaddya mean? You're busy fighting the spacecraft, the winds-

[WHITESUITS]

Clouds, sky, calm and neat

Take a look, when you're flying by your seat

[JEBADIAH]

Stage off! You're talking to a purist

Whose every save's among the surest

I get my kicks without mods, Sunshine!

[WHITESUITS]

One night on Alpha makes a pilot humble

Not much between you and the vacuum, see

One night on Alpha and the rockets tumble

Can't be too careful with your launches, see

I can feel explosions coming 'head for me

[JEBADIAH]

Gene here's gonna be the witness

To the ultimate test of spaceflight fitness

This provides much more for us

Than a launch of probes or a ship of whitesuits

Praise the VAB I'm only riding the rocket -- controlling it --

I don't see you guys rating

The kind of trip I'm contemplating

I'd let you watch, I would invite you

But the courses we use would not excite you

So you better go back to your bars, your space centers, your control rooms --

[WHITESUITS]

One night on Alpha and the world's your oyster

The ships are temples and the fuel is free

You'll find a launch in every golden cloister

If you're lucky, then the launch is free

I can feel the launcher pushing up on me

One night on Alpha makes a pilot humble

Not much between you and the vacuum, see

One night on Alpha and the rockets tumble

Can't be too careful with your launches, see

I can feel the staging coming up on me...

- - -

Please leave critiques/comments below!

Edited November 5, 2015 by The Error
